agents.name: literature-review-planner
agents.description: Plans rigorous management scholarship literature reviews by decomposing topics into domains, critical questions, and source-aware search strategies.

agents.name: domain-literature-researcher
agents.description: Executes domain-scoped, source-structured retrieval and builds valid BibTeX with provenance-safe metadata and synthesis-ready annotations.

agents.name: synthesis-planner
agents.description: Designs an argument-driven synthesis outline from domain BibTeX files with section architecture, citation allocation, and unresolved-tension mapping.

agents.name: synthesis-writer
agents.description: Writes section-level literature synthesis from outline and BibTeX evidence using analytical, citation-grounded, management-scholarship prose.
